decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location plan (unnumbered, no date); 01-EXISTING- 01; 01-PROPOSED- 02; Design and Access Statement prepared by MZA Planning (no date). Received on 12 January 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for physiotherapy, massage therapy, pilates and rehabilitation clinic at first and second floor of this building shall not be carried on outside the following times: Monday to Saturday 7.00am - 7.30pm and 9am - 12pm on Saturday.

Condition : 4 - The premises shall be used for physiotherapy, massage therapy, pilates and rehabilitation clinic at first and second floor of this building and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
description: Change of use of first and second floors from Estate Agent (Use Class A2) to Physiotherapy, Massage therapy, Pilates and Rehabilitation clinic (Use Class D1)
